backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with types for residents, medications, vitals, MAR, ADL, and related entities, forming the core data model for the system.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old resident and medication records to the new schema including medication routes.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v46.md: Deployment guide detailing steps and checks for rolling back the application to version 46.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and light/dark theme styles for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Frontend HTML entry point setting metadata, version tag 46, icons, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining app name, icons, colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/version.txt: Contains the current deployed frontend version number, 46.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routing, React Query, authentication gate, and the main app shell for the frontend.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Wrapper that shows initialization/login UI using Internet Identity and renders children when authenticated.
Displays a logo image with multiple URL fallbacks and an initials fallback if all variants fail.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Main app shell with header, navigation, sign‑out handling, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Simple navigation bar highlighting the active route, currently containing a dashboard link.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Dialog for creating a new resident with extensive form fields, validation handling, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Dialog form for creating ADL records with validation and submission to backend.
Lists, sorts, and allows deletion of ADL records for a resident, with loading and empty states.
Re-exports ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing resident information with dynamic lists, validation cleanup, and save handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Dialog form for adding MAR medication administration records tied to active medications.
Re-exports MAR dialog and history list components.
Lists, sorts, and supports deletion of MAR records with date/time formatting.
Dialog for adding a medication to a resident, including dosage, route, schedule, prescriber, and notes.
Dialog component for editing medication details, managing form state, and submitting updates.
Barrel file exporting medication-related dialog and selector components.
Select component for choosing a prescribing physician with fallback to text input when none exist.
Select component for medication administration routes, including support for custom 'other' entries.
Action buttons and confirmation dialogs for editing, discontinuing, resuming, or deleting a medication.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Card UI showing a resident’s summary with view, status toggle, and delete actions.
Header section for the resident dashboard with title and an add‑resident button.
Toolbar providing room filtering and sorting options for the resident list.
Displays a grid of ResidentCard components or an empty state when no residents match filters.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged resident counts.
Provides tab-based filtering for resident status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for recording a resident's daily vitals, validating inputs, and submitting a vitals entry.
Displays a resident's vitals history with formatted entries and delete confirmation flow.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: UI placeholder showing missing reference materials and listing required sections.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Defines factory functions for resident-related React Query keys scoped by principal ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHealthCheck.ts: Runs a timed health check using an anonymous actor and exposes a derived status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend operations in React Query hooks for user profiles, residents directory access, and related functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color themes, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports static branding constants such as site name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/medicationRoutes.ts: Defines medication route options and helpers to convert, parse, and format route values.
frontend/src/lib/medications.ts: Utility functions for updating, deleting, toggling, filtering, and generating IDs for medications.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard component that loads resident directory data, applies filters and sorting, computes KPIs, and handles resident deletion and status toggling.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data for residents, with special entries for resident ID 3 and a default fallback.
Defines resident profile data structures and returns fallback mock profile data when backend data is unavailable.
Contains mock resident directory entries with basic demographic and medication counts.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Utility functions for calculating and formatting a resident’s age from a birthdate.
Converts backend resident records into UI view models, formatting age, room, and status fields.
Utility methods for filtering, sorting, and summarizing resident view models, including KPI and room extraction.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays a resident’s full profile with backend or mock data and supports editing info, managing medications, and recording vitals, MAR, and ADL entries.
Generates a printable resident profile report including demographics, insurance details, and medication list.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: React page listing required screenshot and design references for recreating the Maui Lane Care Home UI, organized into categories with icons and status tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Maui Lane Care Home build, architecture notes, known issues, existing features, and generated assets.
